_help.structure: Organize updates by year > month > section. Each section can have multiple items.
quick_add_tips: New music track/album? → Add to 'music' section with type 'content'
New video/show? → Add to 'videos' section with type 'content'
New artist added? → Add to 'artists' section with type 'content'
App update? → Add to 'platform' section with type 'technical'
New feature? → Add to 'platform' section with type 'feature'
New merch product? → Add to 'merch' section with type 'content'
Upcoming event? → Add to 'events' section with type 'content'
Empty sections are fine - they won't show on the page
minimal_update_examples: Just added 3 new tracks → 'music': [{'type': 'content', 'title': 'New Music Added', 'description': 'Three new tracks from indie artists', 'link': '/music'}]
Fixed a bug → 'platform': [{'type': 'technical', 'title': 'Bug Fixes', 'description': 'Various bug fixes and improvements', 'link': '/'}]
New merch item → 'merch': [{'type': 'content', 'title': 'New Product', 'description': 'Check out our latest merch', 'link': '/merch'}]
